title: Wayne Dwyer
text:
Wayne Patrick Dwyer is a New Zealand former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a>.
Playing career.
A Marist representative, Dwyer first represented the <a href="West%20Coast%20rugby%20league%20team">West Coast</a> in 1978.
During the 1980s Dwyer represented both the West Coast and the <a href="South%20Island%20rugby%20league%20team">South Island</a>. He was included in the <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand national rugby league team</a> squad in 1982 but did not play a Test match for <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a>.
He retired in 1998, with his last match being the <a href="West%20Coast%20Rugby%20League">West Coast Rugby League</a> grand final.
